title: Arjun film to start rolling in Bangalore
text: Arjun film to start rolling in Bangalore Friday, 23 October 2015 (11 minutes ago) Gautham Menon To Direct Allu Arjun In 'Multilingual' Film 01:34 Filmmaker Gautham Vasudev Menon plans to start a multi-lingual project with Puneeth Rajkumar, Fahadh Faasil, Simbu and Allu Arjun.Filmmaker Gautham Vasudev Menon, who is on the brink of wrapping up his Tamil-Telugu bilingual film “Achcham Yenbadhu Madamaiyada”, plans to start a...
